transcript: Emperor's gratitude was announced to the vanguard, rewards were promised, and the men received a double ra- tion of vodka. The campfires crackled and the soldiers' songs resounded even more merrily than on theprevious night. Denisov celebrated his promotion to the rank of major, and Ros- t6v, who had already drunk enough, at the end of the feast proposed the Emperor's health. "Not 'our Sovereign, the Emperor,' as they say at official dinners," said he, "but the health of our Sovereign, that goo
